title: 820-3437-b Kernel Panics
message:
Hi, got a 820-3437-b that kernel panics on boot, sometimes i can get to the login screen, but kernel panics just after. 
Things ive tried:

Changing thermal paste = Still Crashes
Botting from linux USB = The mac wont crash
Installing another OS = Some USB's run but cant finish installing
SMC bypass = Crashes
Disconnecting keyboard/TP =  The mac wont crash
Swapped motherboards with a fully working Air = Still crashes

Attached is a picture i managed to take of the error.

title: 820-3437-b Kernel Panics
message:
Can you boot (preinstalled) USB macOS?
Crashes w/ and w/o battery connected?

Run EFI ASD and check if any error pops up.

Just in case, try full known good (clean ME) BIOS.

title: 820-3437-b Kernel Panics
message:
Crashes with and w/o batt connected

EFI ASD says there may be an issue with fan and memory module (errors PPM002 and PPF004)

Reballed Memory modules but same issue.

Do you have clean ME BIOS? Thanks

title: 820-3437-b Kernel Panics
message:
Test with known good trackpad board/flex; similar for LIO board/flex.
Also try disconnecting webcam.

I recommend to use known good battery too.
